thread.section_title: GoDaddy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GoDaddy | www.godaddy.com | 2 of 119
thread.title: Diane Huth

author: Diane Huth
title: Diane Huth
text:
In my book, I recommend that every professional needs a personal website to showcase credentials and use to host a consulting business at all times.
And I state "I strongly recommend you use GoDaddy for all your domain and web services — I have had nothing but the most outstanding customer service from them 24/7 by knowledgeable techs who live in the United States! They are the only web domain and web services company you ever will need."
"I suggest you build a small 1- to 3-page professional website to serve as a digital résumé and portfolio. Showcase your skills, projects you have done, your business philosophy and more. The GoDaddy Website Builder is very easy and intuitive to use, and you can build a professional and attractive website in just a few hours. Then it just takes minutes to update it at no additional cost."
Diane Huth, Author of BRAND YOU! To Land Your Dream Job
